duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide academic planning services based on program requirements and support services to students.
Contact students regularly to maintain rapport, address concerns, and provide support.
Assist students with questions related to course navigation, academic policies, and technical assistance.
Offer guidance to at-risk students to ensure their success and retention.
Participate in process improvement initiatives and procure proper forms and paperwork from students.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of a High School Diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
